heading: Deferred submittal
text:
With the prior approval of the department, the applicant may defer submittal of portions of
the design until a specified period of time after the issuance of a permit. The applicant shall list the deferred submittal items on
the initial application for construction document approval. The deferred submittal items shall not be constructed or installe d
until the design and submittal documents for the item have been approved by the department.
